alert.note: Alert for Coastal Aransas; Coastal Refugio; Coastal San Patricio; Inland San Patricio (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 16 at 11:54AM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Aransas and eastern San Patricio Counties through 1230 PM CDT... At 1154 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Aransas Pass, or 8 miles northeast of Portland, moving west at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Portland, Taft, Ingleside, Aransas Pass, Gregory, Bayside and Taft Southwest. This includes US Highway 181 between mile markers 630 and 638. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Aransas; Coastal Refugio; Coastal San Patricio; Inland San Patricio
